class.name: anywheresoftware.b4a.agraham.byteconverter.ByteConverter
class.comment:
This ByeConverter object can transform arrays of primitive types to and from arrays of Bytes with the "endian-ness" of the conversion specified.
Byte arrays can be transformed to and from a hexadecimal string representation.
Strings can be transformed to and from arrays of Bytes using specified encodings and to and from arrays of Chars.
An array copy method is thrown in for good measure.

method.name: CharsFromBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Bytes and returns an array of Chars converted from that array.

method.name: ShortsToBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Shorts and returns an array of Bytes converted from that array.

method.name: IntsToBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Ints and returns an array of Bytes converted from that array.

method.name: DoublesFromBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Bytes and returns an array of Doubles converted from that array.

method.name: StringToBytes
method.comment: Returns an array of bytes containing the the characters in str converted to bytes according to encoding.

method.name: HexToBytes
method.comment: Returns an array of bytes containing the data represented by a hexadecimal string. The string can be upper or lower case.

method.name: FloatsToBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Floats and returns an array of Bytes converted from that array.

method.name: FromChars
method.comment: Returns a string converted from the specified array of characters.

method.name: StringFromBytes
method.comment: Returns a string containing the bytes in the array interpreted as characters according to encoding.

method.name: ArrayCopy
method.comment: Copies count elements from the srcoffset in the src array to destoffset in the dest array. The arrays need to be of the same type otherwise an ArrayStoreException is thrown.

method.name: ToChars
method.comment: Returns an array of chars comprising the characters of the specified string

method.name: DoublesToBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Doubles and returns an array of Bytes converted from that array.

method.name: SupportedEncodings
method.comment: Returns a string array containing all the values for encodings that are supported by this system.

method.name: ShortsFromBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Bytes and returns an array of Shorts converted from that array.

method.name: IntsFromBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Bytes and returns an array of Ints converted from that array.

method.name: CharsToBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Chars and returns an array of Bytes converted from that array.

method.name: FloatsFromBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Bytes and returns an array of Floats converted from that array.

method.name: LongsToBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Longs and returns an array of Bytes converted from that array.

method.name: LongsFromBytes
method.comment: Takes an array of Bytes and returns an array of Longs converted from that array.

method.name: HexFromBytes
method.comment: Returns a string containing the representation in hexadecimal of the bytes in a byte array.

property.name: Version
property.comment: Returns the version number of this library.

property.name: LittleEndian
property.comment: Gets or sets the endian-ness of byte conversions to and from other primitive values. The default for Android is Big_Endian, Windows PCs are Little_Endian.

root.comment:
This library contains a ByeConverter object that can transform arrays of primitive types to and from arrays of Bytes specifying the "endian-ness" of the conversion and also provides for the copying of part or all of the contents of one array to another array of the same type.
Byte arrays can be transformed to and from a hexadecimal string representation and Strings can be transformed to and from arrays of Bytes using specified encodings.
